comment: used to annotate the site on a given sequence to which a primer molecule binds - not intended to represent the sequence of the primer molecule itself; PCR components and reaction times may be stored under the "/PCR_conditions" qualifier; since PCR reactions most often involve pairs of primers, a single primer_bind key may use the order() operator with two locations, or a pair of primer_bind keys may be used.
definition: non-covalent primer binding site for initiation of replication, transcription, or reverse transcription; includes site(s) for synthetic e.g., PCR primer elements;
